content:
System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters Namespace

Definition

The System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters namespace contains classes you can use to override the life-cycle stages of a mobile control to modify its default HTML, CHTML, or WML markup or behavior for new markup standards or for specific browsers and mobile devices. The APIs in this namespace are obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

In this Article

Introduction

ControlAdapter class is directly or indirectly inherited by all other adapter classes in this namespace, such as HtmlControlAdapter and WmlControlAdapter, as well as HtmlPageAdapter, ChtmlPageAdapter, and WmlPageAdapter.

Classes

ChtmlCalendarAdapter

Provides a Calendar adapter class for the cHTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
ChtmlCommandAdapter

Provides the command adapter class for the cHTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
ChtmlFormAdapter

Provides the form adapter class (that is, the adapter for the Form control) for the cHTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
ChtmlImageAdapter

Provides an image adapter class for the cHTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
ChtmlLinkAdapter

Provides a link adapter class for the cHTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
ChtmlMobileTextWriter

Provides text writer functionality for devices targeted by the cHTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
ChtmlPageAdapter

Provides a page adapter for the cHTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
ChtmlPhoneCallAdapter

Provides a call adapter class for the cHTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
ChtmlSelectionListAdapter

Provides a selection list adapter class for the cHTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
ChtmlTextBoxAdapter

Provides a text-box adapter class for the cHTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
ControlAdapter

The ControlAdapter class itself is abstract and cannot be instantiated. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlCalendarAdapter

Provides a calendar adapter class for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlCommandAdapter

Provides a command adapter class for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlControlAdapter

Provides the control adapter base class for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlFormAdapter

Provides the form adapter class (that is, the adapter for the Form) for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlImageAdapter

Provides an image adapter class for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlLabelAdapter

Provides a label adapter class for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlLinkAdapter

Provides a link adapter class for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlListAdapter

Provides a list adapter class for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlLiteralTextAdapter

Provides a literal text adapter class for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlMobileTextWriter

Provides text writer functionality for devices targeted by the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlObjectListAdapter

Provides an object list adapter class for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlPageAdapter

Provides a page adapter for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlPanelAdapter

Provides a panel adapter class for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlPhoneCallAdapter

Provides a phone call adapter class for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlSelectionListAdapter

Provides a selection list adapter class for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlTextBoxAdapter

Provides a text box adapter class for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlTextViewAdapter

Provides a text view adapter class for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlValidationSummaryAdapter

Provides a validation summary adapter class for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
HtmlValidatorAdapter

Provides a validator adapter class for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
MobileTextWriter

Provides the base class for all TextWriter objects used for rendering ASP.NET mobile controls. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
MultiPartWriter

Provides the base class for the MobileTextWriter class. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
SR

Represents an auto-generated resource class. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
UpWmlMobileTextWriter

Provides the mobile text writer adapter class for the WML device adapter set specifically designed for Openwave's UP browser. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
UpWmlPageAdapter

Provides the page adapter class for the WML device adapter set specifically designed for Openwave's UP browser. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlCalendarAdapter

Provides a calendar adapter class for the WML device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlCommandAdapter

Provides a command adapter class for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlControlAdapter

Provides the control adapter base class for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlFormAdapter

Provides the Form adapter for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlImageAdapter

Provides an image adapter class for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlLabelAdapter

Provides a label adapter class for the WML device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlLinkAdapter

Provides a Link adapter class for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlListAdapter

Provides a List adapter class for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlLiteralTextAdapter

Provides a LiteralText adapter class for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlMobileTextWriter

Provides a mobile text writer adapter class for the WML device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat

Stores the font format attributes. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlLayout

Contains wrapping and alignment information for WmlMobileTextWriter. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlObjectListAdapter

Provides an object list adapter class for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlPageAdapter

Provides a MobilePage adapter for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlPanelAdapter

Provides a Panel adapter class for the WML device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlPhoneCallAdapter

Provides a phone call adapter class for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlSelectionListAdapter

Provides a SelectionList adapter class for the WML device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlTextBoxAdapter

Provides a TextBox adapter class for the WML device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlTextViewAdapter

Provides a TextView adapter class for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlValidationSummaryAdapter

Provides a ValidationSummary adapter class for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
WmlValidatorAdapter

Provides a validator adapter class for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

Enums

WmlPostFieldType

Specifies how a post field is rendered. This class cannot be inherited. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
